answers.answer: hi,it could be neuropathy involving probably common peroneal nerve or else.This could result from prolonged diabetes ,injury,habitual leg crossing etc.Please consult neurologist for evaluation.bye and take care!

question: My right foot has been burning for 6 days. It comes and goes with a burning sensation lasting for 2 seconds or so.  Could this be related to taking the drug Zoloft? Who do I go to for treatment?
title: burning foot
